name: Monochromania
description:
This was made as a final project for a one of my classes in the fall semester of 2019, alongside Noah Hulick. Your goal is to make every tile the same color by walking over it, and ending on the exit tile.

Controls are detailed in the game itself.

After level 6, the levels become random, and it's not unlikely that the levels will be unbeatable. It turns out that ensuring a Hamiltonian path exists is kind of hard.
